name: sgs_bridge
body:
Welcome to sgs_bridge
=========================
This repository will be used to help merge and track ideas, suggestions and general information pertaining to the [sgs_bridge](http://github.com/erkemp/sgs_bridge) project.

### Overview
This project was started in order to create some level of continuity between Steam Group Chats and the [r/SGS](http://reddit.com/r/steamgameswap) community.

Chat rooms are a fantastic resource for any community, and access to live/active members should not be restricted to Steam -- or having to keep the chat window the entire time.



### Main Objectives
 * Provide a *near*-seamless experience between IRC and Steam Group Chat

<More to Follow>
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
